greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T(n,0)= 1, T(n,k) = sum_{j=1..min(n,k)} (n-j+1)*T(j,k-j) if k>0.
maple: A054250 := proc(n,k) option remember; local j; if k = 0 then RETURN(1) else add( (n-j+1)*A054250(j,k-j), j=1..min(n,k) ); fi; end;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 06 2000
